documents.document: Absolutely epic. Sporting contests don't come much better than this #FedererNadal #AusOpen2017

And here I was thinking we were in 2017. Obviously forgot to put my clock back 30 years last night.

A shame, but it's felt that way for the past couple of years. https://t.co/Z4t9OFbk4G

You really are beautiful New Zealand #aorakimountcook #lakepukaki https://t.co/0qTESLmhU7

Welly has the wobbles again. Biggest aftershock since last night #eqnz
@EmmaLStoney That should have read Hamner
And another one! Long night ahead. Hope those in Hamer / Christchurch are ok #eqnz
That's got the adrenalin flowing. Biggest shake I've felt in Wellington
I dread to think what state the world - let alone America - is going to be in in four years' time. #USElection2016
Magnificent Ireland. What a Test. What a huge sporting week in Chicago! #IREvNZL #Chicago
Nice of Wellington to break out the fireworks to celebrate @A_Dura22 #250 and Vince Lia #200 #WELvNEW https://t.co/gyqPgTzDWw

Wonder if Wayne Barnes has just been added to the list of northern hemisphere referees Michael Cheika doesn't like #yellow #AUSvARG
Sense All Blacks can go up another gear in the second half, wonder if the Boks can #NZLvRSA
All Blacks really are just light years ahead of other teams at the moment. They flick the switch and it's game over #NZLvARG
Cracking half of rugby. All Blacks being put under real pressure. Some great footwork and offloading from Pumas #NZLvARG
Titch retires. 4 Com Games golds, 12 World Series titles, 2 7s World Cups and helping 40-odd players become All Blacks. An incredible career
@JonnyLiebenberg @AllBlacks @qantaswallabies Springboks and Pumas will certainly fancy their chances against the Aussies
Bledisloe wrapped up for another year by @AllBlacks. Had to work a bit harder tonight but too much class for @qantaswallabies #NZLvAUS
Show time! https://t.co/JBdz4Bn6o1
@Mo_Farah utterly brilliant. An outstanding run by the champion #Gold #Rio2016
Big news out of Glasgow. Dave Rennie will be the Warriors coach from 2017/18. https://t.co/S5f6FF4x3l
That was awesome from Mo Farah. What an incredible race #Rio2016 #Gold
#GBR thoroughly outplayed in the final but worthy #Silver medalists. Beat some very good teams to get to final #Rio2016 #Rugby7s
An absolute masterclass from #FIJ Just brilliant to see @benjaminryan and @fijirugby win the #Gold #Rugby7s #Rio2016
@SparkNZ My broadband internet is down. Are you having system-wide problems?
@WgtnPhoenixFC's new centre-back Marco Rossi https://t.co/nmx7fduakq
@Hurricanesrugby prove defence wins championships. Amazing effort not to concede a single try in the play-offs. #HURvLIO #champs
Today's guide on 'How not to run a major sporting event' comes to you courtesy of the IOC. Updates available over the next 2 weeks #Rio2016
So it's a second successive home Super Rugby final for the Hurricanes. Will it finally be their year? #HURvCHI
James Lowe's error sums up Chiefs' night really. #HURvCHI
Barrett has surely earned himself the All Blacks No.10 jersey for the Bledisloe Cup. Cruden has been very quiet. #HURvCHI
I'm guessing Rennie's HT message to the Chiefs will be "take the points on offer". Boyd's is likely to be "more of the same boys" #HURvCHI
2/2 It took me more than an hour, scanners were shut and latecomers got priority! That's plain wrong. https://t.co/XeRZikprig
people who give themselves plenty of time to clear security shouldn't suffer because of your poor system. 1/2 https://t.co/XeRZikprig
@manairport Any reason half the security scanners aren't being used when it's so busy in T1. And latecomers keep getting priority!
@manairport What an absolute shambles at security. Been here nearly an hour and still waiting to go through while latecomers get priority!
Aussies have a bit to do before they face the All Blacks in the Bledisloe. Looked much better with Toomua at 12 #AUSvENG
Cracking series. Lot to like about this England side already, but plenty more to come from them. #AUSvENG
Lots to like in that 1st half. England missing Haskell till Itoje switched to the flank. Toomua made a big difference for Aussies #AUSvENG
Hope Wales keep playing the expansive style they've shown this series. Reckon Liam Williams will be back in NZ as a Lion next year #NZLvWAL
Too much poor kicking from a very tired-looking Wales side tonight. Paid the price with Dagg, Barrett and B Smith carving it up. #NZLvWAL
Strong finish from Wales, but four tries in 14 minutes shows the class / relentlessness of the All Blacks. FT 36-22 #NZLvWAL
Big score for Wales on the stroke of HT. All Blacks won't be happy about that. 10-10. Big second half to come #NZLvWAL
@benjaminryan Hi Ben. Would you mind giving me a follow please so I can DM you re Olympics. Thanks
This is going to be a ripper series #AUSvENG
That's a great win for England but Wallabies gave them a big helping hand with the penalties they coughed up. #AUSvENG
Haskell has been a human missile tonight and has rarely missed his target #AUSvENG
Wallabies indiscipline killed them in that first half. Farrell made them pay. Itoje been impressive #AUSvENG
Big final 20 mins from ABs. Bench did its job. Great to see Wales play with such ambition. Roll on Wellington #NZLvWAL
1st half over in the blink of an eye. Liam Williams excellent. Wales deserve HT 18-15 lead #NZLvWAL
Telling comment from Steve Hansen - we're not rebuilding we're re-establishing #AllBlacks
